s.text: I am writing this message to you today because my husband Dave passed away on December 17 2009.
Kindly reply immediately together with your complete address which will be used for the transferring of the money to your country.
Being a devoted christian family i have no other option than to use this amount is $22 million to help those that is in need.
Kindly reply immediately together with your complete address which will be used for the transferring of the money to your country.

so I would like you to think over this huge privilege that i am entrusting to your hand for the survival of the casualties and homeless, just send me your full names, home address, telephone number, occupation and more information about you in your next message for the service of God in your country and for the less privilege one's.
My late husband was diagnosed with cancer and heart attack just before he was admitted to the hospital.

Date: Sat, 6 Nov 2010 02:44:22 -0700 (PDT) From: Julie Dave <julydavi@att.net> Reply-To: juliedave@mysinamail.com Subject: From Dave's Wife, Julie To: undisclosed recipients: ;
